lead_paragraph: The study was testing the use of genetically engineered cells as a treatment for cancer, which had shown promising earlier results.

headline.print_headline: Juno Halts Cancer Treatment Trial Using Gene-Altered Cells After 3 Deaths
headline.main: Juno Halts Cancer Trial Using Gene-Altered Cells After 3 Deaths

snippet: The study was testing the use of genetically engineered cells as a treatment for cancer, which had shown promising earlier results....
abstract: Food and Drug Admin halts Juno Therapeutics clinical trial following deaths of three patients from brain swelling; complications from side effects slow promising cancer therapy that involved genetically engineered cells; Juno shares fall 27 percent on news.
